# Vignette widget

```{r, echo=FALSE}
# set seed for reproducible widget id
if (requireNamespace("htmltools", quietly = TRUE)) {
  htmlwidgets::setWidgetIdSeed(42)
}

library(leaflet)

leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(
    lng=174.768,
    lat=-36.852,
    popup="The birthplace of R"
  )
```
